arts.ttl: Napoli Player Ratings vs Udinese: Lukaku & Neres Phenomenal
arts.sum: Napoli returned to winning ways in Serie A after last Sunday's home upset against Lazio, beating Udinese 3-1 at the Bluenergy Stadium. Antonio Conte's side overturned a halftime deficit in Udine to maintain a two-point distance on table-topping Atalanta. The post Napoli Player Ratings vs Udinese: Lukaku & Neres Phenomenal appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
